title: swiftxi

comments.author: AnonBitCoiner
comments.body: Your last 20 posts are not more than 1 line. how can you satisfied your clients with your quality post claim? Why not you work here properly and make quality posts to increase your rank. if you increase your rank to atleast member (10 Merit) i hope you will be easily eligible in Altcoins bounties where your earning will be more than 30$ per month. after that continue your journey to become full member and you will be able to join signature compaign here and your weekly salary will be 40$.Some Altcoins (bounties) i will recommend for Junior or memberComboÂ  Network (Listed in Binance)Hexhash

comments.author: Despairo
comments.body: Jr Member rank account's signature has really limited space and not clickable, not to mention you still not able to wear an avatar.Looking at your history post, you're just creating one liner post in spam altcoins board. The 1000+ views you mentioned aren't the total users looking at your post, but the 1000+ views are accumulated from the thread was created.What make it's funny you're asking for upfront payment, you should be happy if at least there's project interested with your offer.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Unfortunately for you jr member ranks are not very popular for custom deals. Combine that with the fact that you have no reputation or trust built in the community, i'd say you're a high risk to pay upfront. As a community we want to see people succeed, but we also look out for each other.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: swiftxi on April 30, 2023, 03:07:03 AMIm renting out my profile space for your brand advertisment.30$ in btc for 30 Days.Guarantee atleast 5 post activity per day on high volume threads.(1000+ views)DM me here in forum , payment is upfront btw i dont wait till end of monthIf you cannot get in on other campaigns here your chances are not good getting a client, why not challenge yourself to rank first on at least of the full member rank and qualify yourself on existing campaigns here so you have a resume to show on your offer and besides junior member rank has a limitation on their signature space, you cannot even wear avatar, that is why junior rank is not on the majority of signature campaigns.

comments.author: swiftxi

comments.body: 1.000.000 $Exactly 30 $ is not really anything that is why im not asking more since its Junior acc.I never told you that i will make long creative posts every day.All I wrote is, 5 post minimum on high view count threads.Pretending to not understand what is going on, and then using massive ammounts of text to try to untangle the situation is not something I would call quality posting.How about you cut the crap... I did not know about the limits on banners.
